Sure! To add a Pricing section at the top of your website (before the Home section), I'll follow these steps:

  1. Add a Pricing section in the HTML.

  2. Update the Navigation to include a link to the Pricing section.

  3. Provide a simple layout for the Pricing section with sample pricing information (you can modify it later).

Updated HTML with Pricing Section:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>UniPilot - Inquiry Form</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Header Section with Logo and Navigation -->
    <header class="header">
        <div class="logo-container">
            <!-- UniPilot Logo -->
            <img src="assets/logo.png" alt="UniPilot Logo" class="logo">
        </div>
        <nav class="navbar">
            <ul>
                <li><a href="#home">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>  <!-- Link to Services Section -->
                <li><a href="#pricing">Pricing</a></li>  <!-- Link to Pricing Section -->
                <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
                <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>  <!-- Link to Inquiry Form -->
            </ul>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <!-- Pricing Section -->
    <section class="pricing-section" id="pricing">
        <h2>Our Pricing Plans</h2>
        <p>We offer affordable pricing plans to help you with your journey to studying in Germany. Below are our three main plans:</p>
        
        <div class="pricing-container">
            <!-- Basic Plan -->
            <div class="pricing-card">
                <h3>Basic Plan</h3>
                <p>Perfect for students looking for guidance on university selection and application assistance.</p>
                <ul>
                    <li>University Shortlisting</li>
                    <li>Application Guidance</li>
                    <li>Email Support</li>
                </ul>
                <h4>$199</h4>
                <button>Choose Plan</button>
            </div>

            <!-- Standard Plan -->
            <div class="pricing-card">
                <h3>Standard Plan</h3>
                <p>Our most popular plan for students who need comprehensive support with their journey to Germany.</p>
                <ul>
                    <li>University Shortlisting</li>
                    <li>Application & Visa Guidance</li>
                    <li>CV, SOP, and LOR Assistance</li>
                    <li>Visa Assistance</li>
                </ul>
                <h4>$399</h4>
                <button>Choose Plan</button>
            </div>

            <!-- Premium Plan -->
            <div class="pricing-card">
                <h3>Premium Plan</h3>
                <p>For students who want complete support from university applications to post-admission assistance.</p>
                <ul>
                    <li>University Shortlisting</li>
                    <li>Complete Application & Visa Guidance</li>
                    <li>CV, SOP, and LOR Assistance</li>
                    <li>Accommodation & Health Insurance Support</li>
                    <li>Post-Admission Support</li>
                </ul>
                <h4>$599</h4>
                <button>Choose Plan</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Hero Section (Title and Tagline) -->
    <section class="hero" id="home">
        <h1>Welcome to UniPilot</h1>
        <p>Your path to studying in Germany starts here.</p>
    </section> 
        
    <!-- Services Section -->
    <section class="services-section" id="services">
        <h2>Our Services</h2>
        <p>We provide comprehensive services to help you navigate your journey to study in Germany.</p>
        
        <div class="services-container">
            <!-- Service Card 1: SOP -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/sop-icon.png" alt="SOP Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>SOP (Statement of Purpose)</h3>
                <p>We assist you in crafting a compelling Statement of Purpose that showcases your motivations and academic goals.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 2: LOR -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/lor-icon.png" alt="LOR Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>LOR (Letter of Recommendation)</h3>
                <p>Our experts guide you in obtaining strong Letters of Recommendation from your professors or employers.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 3: CV -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/cv-icon.png" alt="CV Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>CV (Curriculum Vitae)</h3>
                <p>We help you build a professional CV that highlights your skills and experiences for university applications.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 4: University Shortlisting -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/university-icon.png" alt="University Shortlisting Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>University Shortlisting</h3>
                <p>We assist you in shortlisting universities that match your academic profile, budget, and career goals.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 5: Money Transfer -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/money-transfer-icon.png" alt="Money Transfer Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>Money Transfer</h3>
                <p>Our platform offers guidance on safe and efficient money transfer options for your tuition fees and living expenses.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 6: Blocked Account -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/blocked-account-icon.png" alt="Blocked Account Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>Blocked Account</h3>
                <p>We help you open a blocked account, a necessary requirement for student visa applications in Germany.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 7: APS Certification -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/aps-icon.png" alt="APS Certification Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>APS Certification</h3>
                <p>We provide guidance on obtaining the APS (Academic Evaluation Centre) certification for your application to German universities.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 8: Accommodation in Germany -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/accommodation-icon.png" alt="Accommodation Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>Accommodation in Germany</h3>
                <p>We assist you in finding safe and affordable accommodation options in Germany during your study period.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 9: Visa Assistance -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/visa-icon.png" alt="Visa Assistance Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>Visa Assistance</h3>
                <p>We guide you through the entire process of applying for a German student visa, including documentation and interview preparation.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 10: Post-Admission Support -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/post-admission-icon.png" alt="Post Admission Support Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>Post-Admission Support</h3>
                <p>We offer continued support after admission, including help with settling in, cultural integration, and academic guidance.</p>
            </div>

            <!-- Service Card 11: Student Health Insurance -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/health-insurance-icon.png" alt="Health Insurance Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>Student Health Insurance</h3>
                <p>We assist in finding suitable student health insurance plans to ensure you're covered while studying in Germany.</p>
            </div>

            <!-- Service Card 12: Student Flight Tickets -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/flight-tickets-icon.png" alt="Flight Tickets Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>Student Flight Tickets</h3>
                <p>We help you find affordable flight tickets to Germany and assist with booking your travel arrangements.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Inquiry Form Section -->
    <section class="form-section" id="contact">
        <h2>Inquiry Form</h2>
        <p>Fill out the form below and we'll guide you through the process of studying in Germany:</p>
        <form action="https://api.web3forms.com/submit" method="POST">
            <input type="hidden" name="access_key" value="b02abaea-8ef1-4c2a-ad71-40ce082c385c">

            <!-- Name Field -->
            <label for="name">Full Name</label>
            <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>

            <!-- Email Field -->
            <label for="email">Email Address</label>
            <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>

            <!-- Message Field -->
            <label for="message">Message</label>
            <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea>

            <!-- Submit Button -->
            <button type="submit">Submit Inquiry</button>
        </form>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer Section -->
    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2025 UniPilot. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>

    <script>
        // Smooth Scroll Behavior
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                document.querySelector(this.getAttribute("href")).scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: "smooth"
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

CSS for Pricing Section:

css
/* Pricing Section */
.pricing-section {
    background-color: white;
    padding: 30px;
    margin: 40px auto;
    width: 80%;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.pricing-section h2 {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    text-align: center;
}

.pricing-section p {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    text-align: center;
    color: #666;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
}

/* Pricing Cards Layout */
.pricing-container {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.pricing-card {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
    padding: 20px;
    width: 30%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    text-align: center;
}

.pricing-card h3 {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    color: #003366;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.pricing-card p {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: #555;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.pricing-card ul {
    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
}

.pricing-card ul li {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: #555;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.pricing-card h4 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: #003366;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.pricing-card button {
    background-color: #003366; /* Dark Blue */
    color: white;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 100%;
}

.pricing-card button:hover {
    background-color: #ff6f61; /* Accent color */
}

Key Features:

  1. Pricing Section:

    • The Pricing section is now added with three pricing plans: Basic, Standard, and Premium.

    • Each plan has a description, services included, and a price with a button to choose the plan.

  2. Responsive Layout:

    • The pricing cards are displayed using flexbox to align them side by side, and they will adjust automatically when the screen size changes (e.g., on mobile).

Next Steps:

  1. Add Images/Icons: Add appropriate images or icons for each service and replace the placeholder assets/xxx-icon.png paths with your actual file paths.

  2. Test: Test the website to ensure that all sections (including Pricing, Services, and the Inquiry Form) are working properly.

  3. Deploy: Once everything is ready, you can deploy your website to GitHub Pages, Netlify, or any other hosting platform.

Let me know if you need further assistance!

You said:
ok in the section of pricing can I have something like this
ChatGPT said:

Sure! I understand that you want to implement a pricing section that looks similar to the one shown in the image, with three pricing plans (Value, Standard, Premium) presented in cards with a price, plan name, and a call-to-action button (such as "Enroll Now" or "Contact Us").

I'll update the Pricing section in the HTML and CSS to create a similar layout and style.

Updated HTML with Pricing Section Similar to the Image:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>UniPilot - Inquiry Form</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Header Section with Logo and Navigation -->
    <header class="header">
        <div class="logo-container">
            <!-- UniPilot Logo -->
            <img src="assets/logo.png" alt="UniPilot Logo" class="logo">
        </div>
        <nav class="navbar">
            <ul>
                <li><a href="#home">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>  <!-- Link to Services Section -->
                <li><a href="#pricing">Pricing</a></li>  <!-- Link to Pricing Section -->
                <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
                <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>  <!-- Link to Inquiry Form -->
            </ul>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <!-- Pricing Section -->
    <section class="pricing-section" id="pricing">
        <h2>Our Pricing Plans</h2>
        <p>We offer affordable pricing plans to help you with your journey to studying in Germany. Below are our three main plans:</p>
        
        <div class="pricing-container">
            <!-- Pricing Card 1: Value Plan -->
            <div class="pricing-card">
                <div class="pricing-icon">
                    <img src="assets/value-icon.png" alt="Value Plan Icon">
                </div>
                <h3>Value Plan</h3>
                <p class="price">Rs. 49,999</p>
                <p>Up to 10 Applications</p>
                <button class="cta-button">Enroll Now</button>
            </div>

            <!-- Pricing Card 2: Standard Plan -->
            <div class="pricing-card">
                <div class="pricing-icon">
                    <img src="assets/standard-icon.png" alt="Standard Plan Icon">
                </div>
                <h3>Standard Plan</h3>
                <p class="price">Rs. 49,999</p>
                <p>Up to 10 Applications</p>
                <button class="cta-button">Enroll Now</button>
            </div>

            <!-- Pricing Card 3: Premium Plan -->
            <div class="pricing-card premium">
                <div class="pricing-icon">
                    <img src="assets/premium-icon.png" alt="Premium Plan Icon">
                </div>
                <h3>Premium Plan</h3>
                <p class="price">Rs. 1,69,999</p>
                <p>Admission Guarantee*</p>
                <button class="cta-button">Contact Us</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Hero Section (Title and Tagline) -->
    <section class="hero" id="home">
        <h1>Welcome to UniPilot</h1>
        <p>Your path to studying in Germany starts here.</p>
    </section> 
        
    <!-- Services Section -->
    <section class="services-section" id="services">
        <h2>Our Services</h2>
        <p>We provide comprehensive services to help you navigate your journey to study in Germany.</p>
        
        <div class="services-container">
            <!-- Service Card 1: SOP -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/sop-icon.png" alt="SOP Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>SOP (Statement of Purpose)</h3>
                <p>We assist you in crafting a compelling Statement of Purpose that showcases your motivations and academic goals.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 2: LOR -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/lor-icon.png" alt="LOR Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>LOR (Letter of Recommendation)</h3>
                <p>Our experts guide you in obtaining strong Letters of Recommendation from your professors or employers.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 3: CV -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/cv-icon.png" alt="CV Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>CV (Curriculum Vitae)</h3>
                <p>We help you build a professional CV that highlights your skills and experiences for university applications.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Inquiry Form Section -->
    <section class="form-section" id="contact">
        <h2>Inquiry Form</h2>
        <p>Fill out the form below and we'll guide you through the process of studying in Germany:</p>
        <form action="https://api.web3forms.com/submit" method="POST">
            <input type="hidden" name="access_key" value="b02abaea-8ef1-4c2a-ad71-40ce082c385c">

            <!-- Name Field -->
            <label for="name">Full Name</label>
            <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>

            <!-- Email Field -->
            <label for="email">Email Address</label>
            <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>

            <!-- Message Field -->
            <label for="message">Message</label>
            <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea>

            <!-- Submit Button -->
            <button type="submit">Submit Inquiry</button>
        </form>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer Section -->
    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2025 UniPilot. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>

    <script>
        // Smooth Scroll Behavior
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                document.querySelector(this.getAttribute("href")).scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: "smooth"
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

Updated CSS for Pricing Section:

css
/* Pricing Section */
.pricing-section {
    background-color: white;
    padding: 30px;
    margin: 40px auto;
    width: 80%;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    text-align: center;
}

.pricing-section h2 {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.pricing-section p {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    color: #666;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
}

/* Pricing Card Layout */
.pricing-container {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.pricing-card {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
    padding: 20px;
    width: 30%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    text-align: center;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.pricing-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-10px); /* Hover effect */
}

.pricing-icon img {
    width: 60px;
    height: 60px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.pricing-card h3 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: #003366;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.pricing-card .price {
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #003366;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.pricing-card p {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: #555;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.pricing-card button {
    background-color: #003366; /* Dark Blue */
    color: white;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 100%;
}

.pricing-card button:hover {
    background-color: #ff6f61; /* Accent color */
}

/* Premium Pricing Card */
.pricing-card.premium {
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    border: 2px solid #003366;
}

Key Features of the Updated Pricing Section:

  1. Three Pricing Plans:

    • Value Plan, Standard Plan, and Premium Plan are displayed in cards with pricing, service descriptions, and call-to-action buttons.

  2. Icons and Images:

    • Each pricing card contains an icon (you can replace the placeholder assets/value-icon.png, etc. with actual icons for each plan).

  3. Hover Effect:

    • Each card has a hover effect to slightly lift it up for a modern interactive feel.

  4. Responsive Layout:

    • The cards are displayed using flexbox, making them responsive and ensuring they adjust on different screen sizes.

Next Steps:

  1. Replace Icons: Add real icons for each plan, replacing assets/value-icon.png, assets/standard-icon.png, etc.

  2. Test: Open the webpage locally and verify everything is working as expected.

  3. Deploy: Once satisfied, deploy your website to GitHub Pages, Netlify, or any other hosting platform.

Let me know if you need further adjustments!

You said:
in the pricing section just below the packages I want this kind of comparison
ChatGPT said:

To achieve a similar pricing comparison table under the pricing packages as shown in the image, I will add a comparison table below the pricing cards. The table will compare the features and benefits of each pricing plan, just like in the image you provided.

Here's how we'll proceed:

  1. Add a Pricing Comparison Table below the three pricing cards.

  2. The table will compare the Value Plan, Standard Plan, and Premium Plan using different features such as the number of applications, validity, counselor support, etc.

Updated HTML Code with Pricing Comparison Table:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>UniPilot - Inquiry Form</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Header Section with Logo and Navigation -->
    <header class="header">
        <div class="logo-container">
            <!-- UniPilot Logo -->
            <img src="assets/logo.png" alt="UniPilot Logo" class="logo">
        </div>
        <nav class="navbar">
            <ul>
                <li><a href="#home">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>  <!-- Link to Services Section -->
                <li><a href="#pricing">Pricing</a></li>  <!-- Link to Pricing Section -->
                <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
                <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>  <!-- Link to Inquiry Form -->
            </ul>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <!-- Pricing Section -->
    <section class="pricing-section" id="pricing">
        <h2>Our Pricing Plans</h2>
        <p>We offer affordable pricing plans to help you with your journey to studying in Germany. Below are our three main plans:</p>
        
        <div class="pricing-container">
            <!-- Pricing Card 1: Value Plan -->
            <div class="pricing-card">
                <div class="pricing-icon">
                    <img src="assets/value-icon.png" alt="Value Plan Icon">
                </div>
                <h3>Value Plan</h3>
                <p class="price">Rs. 49,999</p>
                <p>Up to 10 Applications</p>
                <button class="cta-button">Enroll Now</button>
            </div>

            <!-- Pricing Card 2: Standard Plan -->

                <div class="pricing-icon">
                    <img src="assets/standard-icon.png" alt="Standard Plan Icon">
                </div>
                <h3>Standard Plan</h3>
                <p class="price">Rs. 49,999</p>
                <p>Up to 10 Applications</p>
                <button class="cta-button">Enroll Now</button>
            </div>

            <!-- Pricing Card 3: Premium Plan -->

        </div>

                    <td>Up to 10 Applications</td>
                </tr>

                </tr>

        <form action="https://api.web3forms.com/submit" method="POST">
            <input type="hidden" name="access_key" value="b02abaea-8ef1-4c2a-ad71-40ce082c385c">

        </form>

    </footer>

    <script>
        // Smooth Scroll Behavior
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                document.querySelector(this.getAttribute("href")).scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: "smooth"
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>

CSS for Pricing Comparison Table:

css
/* Pricing Comparison Table */
.pricing-comparison-table {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 40px;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    text-align: left;
}

.pricing-comparison-table th, .pricing-comparison-table td {
    padding: 15px;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
}

.pricing-comparison-table th {
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.pricing-comparison-table td {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.pricing-comparison-table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

/* Highlight "Personalised" and "Admission Guarantee" */
.pricing-comparison-table td {
    font-weight: normal;
}

.pricing-comparison-table td:nth-child(2),
.pricing-comparison-table td:nth-child(3),
.pricing-comparison-table td:nth-child(4) {
    text-align: center;
}

.pricing-comparison-table .premium {
    color: #003366;
}

Key Features:

  1. Pricing Comparison Table:

    • A table below the pricing cards compares features like number of applications, validity, admission guarantee, etc.

    • This comparison makes it easy for visitors to understand the differences between your pricing plans.

  2. Pricing Plans:

    • Value, Standard, and Premium pricing cards are clearly outlined with their benefits.

  3. Responsive Layout:

    • The cards and table are designed to be responsive and adapt to different screen sizes.

Next Steps:

  1. Replace the icons (e.g., assets/value-icon.png) with the appropriate icons or images for each plan.

  2. Test the layout to ensure everything looks good in the browser.

  3. Deploy the site once you’re satisfied with the changes.

Let me know if you need any further adjustments!

Updated HTML Code with Admission Process Comparison:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>UniPilot - Inquiry Form</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Header Section with Logo and Navigation -->
    <header class="header">
        <div class="logo-container">
            <!-- UniPilot Logo -->
            <img src="assets/logo.png" alt="UniPilot Logo" class="logo">
        </div>
        <nav class="navbar">
            <ul>
                <li><a href="#home">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>  <!-- Link to Services Section -->
                <li><a href="#pricing">Pricing</a></li>  <!-- Link to Pricing Section -->
                <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
                <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>  <!-- Link to Inquiry Form -->
            </ul>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <!-- Pricing Section -->
    <section class="pricing-section" id="pricing">
        <h2>Our Pricing Plans</h2>
        <p>We offer affordable pricing plans to help you with your journey to studying in Germany. Below are our three main plans:</p>
        
        <div class="pricing-container">
            <!-- Pricing Card 1: Value Plan -->

            <!-- Message Field -->
            <label for="message">Message</label>
            <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea>

            <!-- Submit Button -->
            <button type="submit">Submit Inquiry</button>
        </form>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer Section -->
    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2025 UniPilot. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>

    <script>
        // Smooth Scroll Behavior
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                document.querySelector(this.getAttribute("href")).scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: "smooth"
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

CSS for Admission Process Comparison Table:

css
/* Admission Process Comparison Table */
.admission-comparison-table {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 40px;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    text-align: left;
}

.admission-comparison-table th, .admission-comparison-table td {
    padding: 15px;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
}

.admission-comparison-table th {
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.admission-comparison-table td {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.admission-comparison-table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

/* Highlight "Personalised" and "Admission Guarantee" */
.admission-comparison-table td {
    font-weight: normal;
}

.admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(2),
.admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(3),
.admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(4) {
    text-align: center;
}

.admission-comparison-table .premium {
    color: #003366;
}

Key Changes:

  1. Admission Process Comparison:

    • Added a new table to compare the Admission Process features for the Value, Standard, and Premium plans.

    • Features include things like APS Application, University Applications, Uni-Assist Fee, etc.

  2. Comparison Table Layout:

    • The comparison table is similar to the pricing comparison, with checkboxes (✔️) and crosses (❌) for each plan’s features.

Next Steps:

  1. Replace Icons: Use appropriate icons for each service and plan, and make sure they are referenced correctly in your HTML.

  2. Test: Test the layout in the browser and ensure everything is aligned and functional.

  3. Deploy: Once you're happy with the site, deploy it to your preferred hosting platform (GitHub Pages, Netlify, etc.).

Let me know if you need any further help!

html

        </form>

    </footer>

    <script>
        // Smooth Scroll Behavior
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                document.querySelector(this.getAttribute("href")).scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: "smooth"
                });
            });
        });
    </script>

CSS for Post Admission Process Table:

css
/* Post Admission Process Comparison Table */
.post-admission-comparison-table {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 40px;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    text-align: left;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table th, .post-admission-comparison-table td {
    padding: 15px;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table th {
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table td {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

/* Highlight "Personalised" and "Admission Guarantee" */
.post-admission-comparison-table td {
    font-weight: normal;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(2),
.post-admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(3),
.post-admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(4) {
    text-align: center;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table .premium {
    color: #003366;
}

Key Features of the New Table:

  1. Post Admission Process: A table comparing post-admission services such as Education Loan, Blocked Account, Health Insurance, Visa Guidance, and Visa Slot Booking.

  2. Comparison: The Value, Standard, and Premium plans are compared, with checkboxes indicating which services are available in each plan.

Next Steps:

  1. Replace Icons: Replace the placeholder assets/xxx-icon.png with appropriate icons for each feature.

  2. Test: Verify that all sections (pricing, comparison, and admission process) display correctly.

  3. Deploy: Once you're happy with the result, deploy the site.

Let me know if you need further help!

You said:
here instead of opening everything in the same page can you modify the pricing in a way that when I click it it opens in a separate page with the pricing plans and package comparisons
ChatGPT said:

Certainly! To modify the pricing section so that when you click a pricing plan, it opens in a separate page with the pricing plans and package comparisons, we can implement the following changes:

  1. Separate Page for Pricing:

    • Create a new pricing page (e.g., pricing.html).

    • When the user clicks on the pricing link, it will navigate to this new page.

  2. Linking the Pricing Section:

    • The Pricing link in the navigation will now point to the new pricing page.

    • The main page will contain a summary or link to the pricing page.

Steps:

  1. Create a New Page (pricing.html): This page will contain all the details about pricing plans and comparisons.

  2. Update the Main Page: Modify the main page to link to the new pricing page.

1. Create the pricing.html Page:

This page will contain the pricing plans and package comparisons as you requested.

pricing.html:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>UniPilot - Pricing Plans</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Header Section with Logo and Navigation -->
    <header class="header">
        <div class="logo-container">
            <!-- UniPilot Logo -->
            <img src="assets/logo.png" alt="UniPilot Logo" class="logo">
        </div>
        <nav class="navbar">
            <ul>
                <li><a href="index.html#home">Home</a></li> <!-- Link to Main Page -->
                <li><a href="index.html#services">Services</a></li>
                <li><a href="pricing.html#pricing">Pricing</a></li>
                <li><a href="index.html#about">About Us</a></li>
                <li><a href="index.html#contact">Contact</a></li> <!-- Link to Inquiry Form -->
            </ul>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <!-- Pricing Section -->
    <section class="pricing-section" id="pricing">

    <!-- Services Section -->
    <section class="services-section" id="services">
        <h2>Our Services</h2>
        <p>We provide comprehensive services to help you navigate your journey to study in Germany.</p>
        
        <div class="services-container">
            <!-- Service Card 1: SOP -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/sop-icon.png" alt="SOP Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>SOP (Statement of Purpose)</h3>
                <p>We assist you in crafting a compelling Statement of Purpose that showcases your motivations and academic goals.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 2: LOR -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/lor-icon.png" alt="LOR Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>LOR (Letter of Recommendation)</h3>
                <p>Our experts guide you in obtaining strong Letters of Recommendation from your professors or employers.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Service Card 3: CV -->
            <div class="service-card">
                <img src="assets/cv-icon.png" alt="CV Icon" class="service-icon">
                <h3>CV (Curriculum Vitae)</h3>
                <p>We help you build a professional CV that highlights your skills and experiences for university applications.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Inquiry Form Section -->
    <section class="form-section" id="contact">
        <h2>Inquiry Form</h2>
        <p>Fill out the form below and we'll guide you through the process of studying in Germany:</p>
        <form action="https://api.web3forms.com/submit" method="POST">
            <input type="hidden" name="access_key" value="b02abaea-8ef1-4c2a-ad71-40ce082c385c">

            <!-- Name Field -->
            <label for="name">Full Name</label>
            <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>

            <!-- Email Field -->
            <label for="email">Email Address</label>
            <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>

            <!-- Message Field -->
            <label for="message">Message</label>
            <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea>

            <!-- Submit Button -->
            <button type="submit">Submit Inquiry</button>
        </form>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer Section -->
    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2025 UniPilot. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>

    <script>
        // Smooth Scroll Behavior
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                document.querySelector(this.getAttribute("href")).scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: "smooth"
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

CSS for Admission Process Comparison:

css
/* Post Admission Process Comparison Table */
.post-admission-comparison-table {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 40px;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    text-align: left;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table th, .post-admission-comparison-table td {
    padding: 15px;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table th {
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table td {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

/* Highlight "Personalised" and "Admission Guarantee" */
.post-admission-comparison-table td {
    font-weight: normal;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(2),
.post-admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(3),
.post-admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(4) {
    text-align: center;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table .premium {
    color: #003366;
}

Key Features:

  1. Post Admission Comparison:

    • This new section compares Post Admission services like Education Loan, Blocked Account, Health Insurance, Travel Insurance, etc., across the Value, Standard, and Premium plans.

  3. Deploy to your desired hosting platform.

  1. New Page: The pricing.html page now includes only the pricing-related content with pricing plans and comparison tables.

  2. Links: The header links now direct to the main index.html page and the pricing section on pricing.html.

  3. Comparison Tables: We have added:

    • Pricing Package Comparison

    • Admission Process Comparison

    • Post-Admission Process Comparison

Each of the tables compares the Value, Standard, and Premium plans with checkmarks (✔️) and crosses (❌) indicating which services are included in each plan.

You said:
pricing is not clickable
ChatGPT said:

It seems that the Pricing link in the navigation is not clickable because the navigation links may not be set up correctly to navigate to the pricing.html page.

Let's fix this by ensuring the Pricing link points to the right location and is properly set up for navigation between the pages. Here's what you need to do:

1. Update the Navigation Links:

Ensure that the Pricing link on your main page (index.html) points to the pricing.html page.

Update the index.html navigation:

html
<nav class="navbar">
    <ul>
        <li><a href="#home">Home</a></li>
        <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>
        <!-- Update Pricing Link to point to the pricing page -->
        <li><a href="pricing.html">Pricing</a></li>  <!-- Link to Pricing Section (pricing.html) -->
        <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
        <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>
    </ul>
</nav>

2. Ensure the Pricing Page Link in pricing.html is Correct:

Ensure that the "Contact" link in the pricing.html page correctly points back to the contact form section in the index.html or the main page.

html
<nav class="navbar">
    <ul>
        <li><a href="index.html#home">Home</a></li> <!-- Link to the Main Page -->
        <li><a href="index.html#services">Services</a></li>
        <li><a href="pricing.html#pricing">Pricing</a></li>
        <li><a href="index.html#about">About Us</a></li>
        <li><a href="index.html#contact">Contact</a></li> <!-- Link to Inquiry Form -->
    </ul>
</nav>

3. Ensure Proper Path and File Location:

  • Make sure both index.html and pricing.html are in the same directory. If they are located in different folders, ensure the correct path is used in the links. For example, if they are in separate folders, you would use relative paths like:

    • <a href="../pricing.html">Pricing</a> (if pricing.html is in a subfolder)

Final Check:

  1. Test the Links: After making these changes, open index.html and click on the Pricing link in the navigation. It should now open the pricing.html page.

  2. Deploy the website after confirming everything works as expected.

Let me know if you need more help!

You said:
now think your self as a consultant for germany. what kind of services will you provide to the students willing to study in germany. and what kind of packages will you have
ChatGPT said:

As a consultant for students willing to study in Germany, I would offer a comprehensive suite of services to guide students through the entire process of applying to universities, securing their visas, and settling down in Germany. The goal would be to provide tailored solutions for every step of the journey, ensuring a smooth experience for international students.

Key Services to Provide:

  1. University Selection & Shortlisting:

    • Based on academic performance, budget, desired location, and preferred program, I would help students shortlist universities that align with their goals. This would include providing insights into top-ranking universities, as well as niche institutions that might suit their needs.

  2. Application Process Assistance:

    • Guidance on University Applications: Helping students navigate the complex application processes, including deadlines, document submission, and understanding program-specific requirements.

    • SOP (Statement of Purpose) Writing Assistance: Providing expert advice and review for writing impactful and personalized SOPs that reflect the student’s aspirations and academic goals.

    • LOR (Letter of Recommendation): Advising students on how to approach their professors or employers to write strong LORs, and reviewing the letters to ensure they meet the university’s expectations.

    • CV Building: Creating professional CVs that align with the European standards, showcasing relevant experiences, skills, and achievements.

  3. Visa and Legal Documentation:

    • Visa Guidance: Step-by-step support in applying for a German student visa, including the necessary documents, interview tips, and assistance with paperwork.

    • Blocked Account Assistance: Helping students open the required blocked account in Germany and providing guidance on the necessary amounts to be deposited.

    • Health Insurance: Assistance in understanding the various student health insurance plans available in Germany and helping students choose the right plan for their stay.

  4. Accommodation and Travel Support:

    • Accommodation Assistance: Helping students find suitable accommodation in Germany (student housing, shared apartments, etc.), assisting with the application process for university dorms or private housing.

    • Flight Booking Assistance: Offering guidance on booking student-friendly flights to Germany, finding discounts, and helping with the best routes.

  5. Financial Assistance & Money Transfer:

    • Banking & Money Transfer Guidance: Assisting students in setting up bank accounts in Germany and advising them on the most cost-effective ways to transfer money.

    • Scholarship Opportunities: Providing information on available scholarships for international students, helping students apply for scholarships or financial aid.

  6. Post-Admission Support:

    • Pre-Departure Guidance: Preparing students for life in Germany, including cultural differences, legal requirements, and daily life tips.

    • Airport Pickup and Local Orientation: Offering services like airport pickup upon arrival in Germany and helping students with basic orientation, including setting up mobile phones, understanding public transportation, etc.

    • Student Networking & Community Support: Connecting students with alumni or peer groups in Germany, creating support networks that help with emotional well-being and settling in.

  7. Career Services:

    • Internship & Job Search Assistance: Providing guidance on how to apply for internships and jobs in Germany, reviewing resumes, and offering interview tips.

    • Work Permit & Post-Graduation Opportunities: Assisting students in understanding the legalities of working in Germany after graduation, including post-graduation work permits and opportunities for transitioning to permanent residency.

Service Packages:

I would offer multiple service packages to cater to different student needs, ranging from basic support to a comprehensive, all-inclusive package. The pricing and features of each package would differ to allow flexibility and cater to different budgets.

1. Basic Package (Value Plan):

  • Price: ₹40,000 – ₹50,000

  • Target Audience: Students who need minimal assistance, mostly handling university application-related tasks independently.

  • Services Included:

    • University Shortlisting & Application Assistance (for up to 5 universities).

    • Basic SOP and CV Review.

    • Basic Visa Guidance (document checklist and tips).

    • Access to scholarships and financial aid resources.

2. Standard Package:

  • Price: ₹75,000 – ₹90,000

  • Target Audience: Students who need comprehensive support but do not require assistance for every single task.

  • Services Included:

    • University Shortlisting & Application Assistance (for up to 10 universities).

    • SOP, LOR, and CV Writing Assistance.

    • Visa Assistance (document preparation, interview prep, and appointment booking).

    • Blocked Account Setup Assistance.

    • Health Insurance Guidance and Enrollment.

    • Accommodation Search & Booking Assistance.

    • Pre-departure support (travel tips and packing list).

3. Premium Package (All-Inclusive):

  • Price: ₹1,50,000 – ₹2,00,000

  • Target Audience: Students who want full support throughout the process, including pre-arrival, during arrival, and post-arrival.

  • Services Included:

    • Full University Shortlisting & Application Assistance (for unlimited universities).

    • Full SOP, LOR, and CV Writing Assistance (including unlimited revisions).

    • Visa Assistance with complete document handling and mock interview preparation.

    • Blocked Account and Health Insurance Assistance.

    • Comprehensive Accommodation Support (from finding accommodation to lease agreements).

    • Travel Booking Assistance (including flight tickets and travel packages).

    • Post-Arrival Assistance (airport pickup, accommodation setup, orientation).

    • Career Guidance (internship/job search assistance, resume building, and interview preparation).

    • Post-Graduation Guidance (work permit and career planning).

4. Custom Package:

  • Price: Custom pricing based on requirements.

  • Target Audience: Students who want specific services and have unique needs.

  • Services Included:

    • Fully customizable based on the student's specific needs (e.g., only visa assistance, or only internship/job search help).

Service Add-Ons:

  • SOP/LOR Writing: ₹10,000 – ₹15,000 (per document).

  • Visa Assistance (Standalone): ₹25,000.

  • Post-Arrival Support: ₹20,000.

  • Airport Pickup Service: ₹5,000.

  • Job/Internship Assistance: ₹10,000.

Suggestions for Packaging:

  • Subscription Model: Monthly or quarterly subscription-based packages that offer continuous support for students throughout the application and settling process.

  • Add-Ons: Allow students to customize their package by adding specific services as needed (e.g., they can add “Post-arrival support” or “Career Guidance” to any package).

Marketing Strategy for These Packages:

  • Basic Package: Marketed as a "Do-It-Yourself" package for students who are self-driven but still need guidance with the basics.

  • Standard Package: Marketed to students who need comprehensive support but don't require full assistance with everything.

  • Premium Package: The all-inclusive, white-glove service package for students who want a complete hassle-free experience.

  • Custom Package: For students with specific needs (e.g., just visa or accommodation help) and are looking for a more tailored approach.

Client Testimonials & Trust Building:

  • Showcase student success stories, testimonials, and case studies to highlight the effectiveness of your services.

  • Offer a free consultation call to help prospective students understand how the services can benefit them.

This approach allows flexibility in pricing and service offerings, catering to different budgets and student needs. The packages can be adjusted based on feedback and demand.

Let me know if you want to fine-tune any specific aspect of the packages or if you need further suggestions!

You said:
I want my inquiry form to be like this in the beginning of the page and to the right. also add all visible sections in the image of inquiry form in mine. to the left keep it empty as I do not have any information to mention right now but i will mention in the future.
ChatGPT said:

To create the inquiry form similar to the one in the image you shared, I will:

  1. Place the Inquiry Form on the right side of the page.

  2. Add the form fields like Name, Email, Mobile Number, and other fields.

  3. Keep the left side of the form empty for now, as per your request. This can be filled with content later.

Here’s how you can modify your HTML and CSS to implement this:

Updated HTML with Inquiry Form to the Right:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>UniPilot - Inquiry Form</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Header Section with Logo and Navigation -->
    <header class="header">
        <div class="logo-container">
            <!-- UniPilot Logo -->
            <img src="assets/logo.png" alt="UniPilot Logo" class="logo">
        </div>
        <nav class="navbar">
            <ul>
                <li><a href="#home">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>
                <li><a href="pricing.html">Pricing</a></li> <!-- Link to Pricing Page -->
                <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
                <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>
            </ul>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <!-- Inquiry Form and Empty Left Section -->
    <section class="main-section">
        <div class="left-section">
            <!-- Empty for future content -->
        </div>

        <div class="right-section">
            <h2>Take the First Step towards Germany</h2>
            <form action="https://api.web3forms.com/submit" method="POST">
                <input type="hidden" name="access_key" value="b02abaea-8ef1-4c2a-ad71-40ce082c385c">

                <!-- Name Field -->
                <label for="name">Enter Name *</label>
                <input type="text" id="name" name="name" placeholder="Enter Name" required>

                <!-- Email Field -->
                <label for="email">Enter Email Address *</label>
                <input type="email" id="email" name="email" placeholder="Enter Email" required>

                <!-- Mobile Number Field -->
                <label for="mobile">Enter Mobile Number *</label>
                <input type="tel" id="mobile" name="mobile" placeholder="Enter Mobile Number" required>

                <!-- State Selection -->
                <label for="state">Select State</label>
                <select id="state" name="state" required>
                    <option value="">Select State</option>
                    <option value="State1">State 1</option>
                    <option value="State2">State 2</option>
                </select>

                <!-- City Selection -->
                <label for="city">Select City</label>
                <select id="city" name="city" required>
                    <option value="">Select City</option>
                    <option value="City1">City 1</option>
                    <option value="City2">City 2</option>
                </select>

                <!-- Program Selection -->
                <label for="program">Select Program</label>
                <select id="program" name="program" required>
                    <option value="">Select Program</option>
                    <option value="Program1">Program 1</option>
                    <option value="Program2">Program 2</option>
                </select>

                <!-- Captcha -->
                <label for="captcha">Enter text as shown</label>
                <input type="text" id="captcha" name="captcha" placeholder="Enter Captcha" required>

                <!-- Agreement Checkbox -->
                <input type="checkbox" id="agree" name="agree" required>
                <label for="agree">I agree to receive information regarding my submitted inquiry.</label>

                <!-- Submit Button -->
                <button type="submit">Submit</button>
            </form>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer Section -->
    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2025 UniPilot. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>

    <script>
        // Smooth Scroll Behavior for navigation links
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                document.querySelector(this.getAttribute("href")).scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: "smooth"
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

CSS for Layout and Styling:

css
/* General Styles */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    color: #333;
}

/* Header Styles */
.header {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 20px 50px;
    background-color: #003366; /* Dark Blue */
}

.logo-container .logo {
    width: 150px;
}

.navbar ul {
    list-style: none;
    display: flex;
}

.navbar ul li {
    margin-left: 20px;
}

.navbar ul li a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: white;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.navbar ul li a:hover {
    color: #ff6f61; /* Accent color */
}

/* Main Section Layout */
.main-section {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 50px;
}

/* Left Section - Empty for now */
.left-section {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    height: 500px;
}

/* Right Section - Inquiry Form */
.right-section {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: white;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    height: 500px;
    max-width: 500px;
    margin-left: 20px;
}

.right-section h2 {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    color: #003366;
}

.right-section label {
    font-size: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    display: block;
}

.right-section input,
.right-section select {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 12px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.right-section button {
    background-color: #003366;
    color: white;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 100%;
}

.right-section button:hover {
    background-color: #ff6f61; /* Accent color */
}

/* Footer Section */
footer {
    background-color: #003366;
    color: white;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 20px;
    margin-top: 40px;
}

footer p {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

Explanation of Changes:

  1. Inquiry Form on the Right:

    • The inquiry form is placed inside the right section of the page.

    • The left section is left empty for now but can be filled with content in the future.

  2. Form Fields:

    • The form includes Name, Email, Mobile Number, and State, City, Program selectors, as well as a Captcha field and an Agreement checkbox.

  3. Layout:

    • The form is centered and aligned to the right side of the page.

    • The left side is reserved for future content.

  4. Buttons and Interactions:

    • A Submit button is placed at the bottom of the form.

    • Added a hover effect on the submit button for interactivity.

Next Steps:

  1. Add the Logo: Ensure the logo image (assets/logo.png) is available in the correct folder.

  2. Test the Form: Verify that the form works as expected. The form should submit to Web3Forms and send the data.

  3. Content for Left Section: You can fill the left section with additional information later as per your requirement.

Let me know if you need further modifications!

ChatGPT said:

Your HTML and CSS look great for setting up the Inquiry Form on the right-hand side with the layout you've requested. However, there are a few minor tweaks we can do to ensure everything is properly aligned and styled, especially considering the pricing section, form alignment, and spacing.

Changes & Improvements:

  1. Ensure the Form is Positioned Correctly: We will need to adjust the flex layout to make sure the inquiry form aligns properly on the right side of the screen, leaving the left side empty for now.

  2. Add Some Space for Left Section: We’ll give it some padding and make sure the right section doesn’t clash with the left side.

  3. Pricing Section: Ensure that the pricing section looks visually balanced and is placed below the form properly.

Finalized HTML:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>UniPilot - Inquiry Form</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Header Section with Logo and Navigation -->
    <header class="header">
        <div class="logo-container">
            <!-- UniPilot Logo -->
            <img src="/Users/baselto/Desktop/UniPilot/assets/20f8b1fa-ec1b-43e1-a26d-3920a2e4061a.png" alt="UniPilot Logo" class="logo">
        </div>
        <nav class="navbar">
            <ul>
                <li><a href="#home">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>
                <li><a href="#pricing">Pricing</a></li>  <!-- Link to Pricing Section -->
                <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
                <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>  <!-- Link to Inquiry Form -->
            </ul>
        </nav>
    </header>
    
    <!-- Hero Section (Title and Tagline) -->
    <section class="hero" id="home">
        <h1>Welcome to UniPilot</h1>
        <p>Your path to studying in Germany starts here.</p>
    </section> 
    
    <!-- Inquiry Form and Empty Left Section -->
    <section class="main-section">
        <div class="left-section">
            <!-- Empty for future content -->
        </div>

        <div class="right-section">
            <h2>Take the First Step towards Germany</h2>
            <form action="https://api.web3forms.com/submit" method="POST">
                <input type="hidden" name="access_key" value="b02abaea-8ef1-4c2a-ad71-40ce082c385c">

                <!-- Name Field -->
                <label for="name">Enter Name *</label>
                <input type="text" id="name" name="name" placeholder="Enter Name" required>

                <!-- Email Field -->
                <label for="email">Enter Email Address *</label>
                <input type="email" id="email" name="email" placeholder="Enter Email" required>

                <!-- Mobile Number Field -->
                <label for="mobile">Enter Mobile Number *</label>
                <input type="tel" id="mobile" name="mobile" placeholder="Enter Mobile Number" required>

                    <option value="">Select State</option>
                    <option value="State1">State 1</option>
                    <option value="State2">State 2</option>

            </form>
        </div>
    </section>

    <script>
        // Smooth Scroll Behavior
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                document.querySelector(this.getAttribute("href")).scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: "smooth"
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

CSS Changes:

  • Inquiry Form Layout: Ensured the form is positioned to the right, with space for content on the left.

  • Flexbox Layout: Used flexbox for the main-section to divide the left and right parts, giving the right section (form) the desired width and centering it on the page.

Key Features:

  1. Inquiry Form on the Right: Positioned the form on the right side with the content section (left side) empty.

  2. Pricing Section: The pricing section with cards and comparisons appears below the form as per your requirement.

  3. Comparison Tables: Included pricing comparison, admission process, and post-admission comparison below the pricing section.

Let me know if this works for your needs or if you need any further changes!

You said:
/* Global Styles */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #f4f4f4; color: #333; } /* Header Styles */ .header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; padding: 20px 50px; background-color: #003366; /* Dark Blue */ position: sticky; top: 0; z-index: 100; } .logo-container .logo { width: 150px; } .navbar ul { list-style: none; display: flex; } .navbar ul li { margin-left: 20px; } .navbar ul li a { text-decoration: none; color: white; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.1rem; transition: color 0.3s ease; } .navbar ul li a:hover { color: #ff6f61; /* Accent color */ } /* Left Section - Empty for now */ .left-section { flex: 1; padding: 20px; background-color: #f0f0f0; height: 500px; } /* Right Section - Inquiry Form */ .right-section { flex: 1; padding: 20px; background-color: white; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); height: 500px; max-width: 500px; margin-left: 20px; } .right-section h2 { font-size: 1.8rem; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #003366; } .right-section label { font-size: 1rem; margin-bottom: 5px; display: block; } .right-section input, .right-section select { width: 100%; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 20px; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 1rem; } .right-section button { background-color: #003366; color: white; font-size: 1.1rem; padding: 15px 20px; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; width: 100%; } .right-section button:hover { background-color: #ff6f61; /* Accent color */ } /* Pricing Section */ .pricing-section { background-color: white; padding: 30px; margin: 40px auto; width: 80%; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); text-align: center; } .pricing-section h2 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 20px; } .pricing-section p { font-size: 1.2rem; color: #666; margin-bottom: 40px; } /* Pricing Card Layout */ .pricing-container { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; flex-wrap: wrap; } .pricing-card { background-color: #f9f9f9; padding: 20px; width: 30%; margin-bottom: 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); text-align: center; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .pricing-card:hover { transform: translateY(-10px); /* Hover effect */ } .pricing-icon img { width: 60px; height: 60px; margin-bottom: 20px; } .pricing-card h3 { font-size: 1.5rem; color: #003366; margin-bottom: 10px; } .pricing-card .price { font-size: 2rem; font-weight: bold; color: #003366; margin-bottom: 15px; } .pricing-card p { font-size: 1rem; color: #555; margin-bottom: 15px; } .pricing-card button { background-color: #003366; /* Dark Blue */ color: white; font-size: 1.1rem; padding: 15px 20px; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; width: 100%; } .pricing-card button:hover { background-color: #ff6f61; /* Accent color */ } /* Premium Pricing Card */ .pricing-card.premium { background-color: #f0f0f0; border: 2px solid #003366; } /* Pricing Comparison Table */ .pricing-comparison-table { width: 100%; margin-top: 40px; border-collapse: collapse; text-align: left; } .pricing-comparison-table th, .pricing-comparison-table td { padding: 15px; border: 1px solid #ddd; } .pricing-comparison-table th { background-color: #f2f2f2; font-size: 1.2rem; } .pricing-comparison-table td { font-size: 1rem; } .pricing-comparison-table tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f9f9f9; } /* Highlight "Personalised" and "Admission Guarantee" */ .pricing-comparison-table td { font-weight: normal; } .pricing-comparison-table td:nth-child(2), .pricing-comparison-table td:nth-child(3), .pricing-comparison-table td:nth-child(4) { text-align: center; } .pricing-comparison-table .premium { color: #003366; } /* Admission Process Comparison Table */ .admission-comparison-table { width: 100%; margin-top: 30px; border-collapse: collapse; text-align: left; } .admission-comparison-table th, .admission-comparison-table td { padding: 15px; border: 1px solid #ddd; } .admission-comparison-table th { background-color: #f2f2f2; font-size: 1.2rem; } .admission-comparison-table td { font-size: 1rem; } .admission-comparison-table tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f9f9f9; } /* Highlight "Personalised" and "Admission Guarantee" */ .admission-comparison-table td { font-weight: normal; } .admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(2), .admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(3), .admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(4) { text-align: center; ChatGPT said:

Based on the reference image you provided and your request, I will update the margins and layout to ensure the inquiry form is placed on the right side of the page, and the left section remains empty for now. I’ll adjust the spacing, padding, and positioning to match the layout from the image.

Here’s what I will do:

  1. Adjust the form's position on the right side of the page.

  2. Increase margins and padding to give the left side some empty space, ensuring the right section has a clean and balanced appearance.

  3. Ensure proper width and alignment similar to your reference image.

                <td>LOR Writing</td>
                <td>✔️</td>
                <td>✔️</td>
                <td>✔️</td>
            </tr>

                <td>✔️</td>
                <td>✔️</td>
                <td>✔️</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>

    <script>
        // Smooth Scroll Behavior
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                document.querySelector(this.getAttribute("href")).scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: "smooth"
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

CSS Updates:

css
/* General Styles */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    color: #333;
}

/* Main Section Layout */
.main-section {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 50px;
    align-items: flex-start;
}

.left-section {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    height: 500px; /* Keep it empty for now */
}

.right-section {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: white;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    max-width: 500px;
    margin-left: 20px;
}

.right-section h2 {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    color: #003366;
}

/* Form Field Styles */
.right-section label {
    font-size: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    display: block;
}

.right-section input,
.right-section select {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 12px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.right-section button {
    background-color: #003366;
    color: white;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 100%;
}

.right-section button:hover {
    background-color: #ff6f61; /* Accent color */
}

/* Pricing Section */
.pricing-section {
    background-color: white;
    padding: 30px;
    margin: 40px auto;
    width: 80%;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    text-align: center;
}

.pricing-section h2 {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.pricing-section p {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    color: #666;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
}

/* Pricing Card Layout */
.pricing-container {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.pricing-card {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
    padding: 20px;
    width: 30%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    text-align: center;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.pricing-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-10px); /* Hover effect */
}

.pricing-icon img {
    width: 60px;
    height: 60px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.pricing-card h3 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: #003366;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.pricing-card .price {
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #003366;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.pricing-card p {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: #555;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.pricing-card button {
    background-color: #003366; /* Dark Blue */
    color: white;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 100%;
}

.pricing-card button:hover {
    background-color: #ff6f61; /* Accent color */
}

/* Premium Pricing Card */
.pricing-card.premium {
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    border: 2px solid #003366;
}

/* Pricing Comparison Table */
.pricing-comparison-table {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 40px;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    text-align: left;
}

.pricing-comparison-table th, .pricing-comparison-table td {
    padding: 15px;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
}

.pricing-comparison-table th {
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.pricing-comparison-table td {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.pricing-comparison-table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

/* Highlight "Personalised" and "Admission Guarantee" */
.pricing-comparison-table td {
    font-weight: normal;
}

.pricing-comparison-table td:nth-child(2),
.pricing-comparison-table td:nth-child(3),
.pricing-comparison-table td:nth-child(4) {
    text-align: center;
}

.pricing-comparison-table .premium {
    color: #003366;
}

/* Admission Process Comparison Table */
.admission-comparison-table {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 30px;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    text-align: left;
}

.admission-comparison-table th, .admission-comparison-table td {
    padding: 15px;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
}

.admission-comparison-table th {
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.admission-comparison-table td {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.admission-comparison-table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

/* Highlight "Personalised" and "Admission Guarantee" */
.admission-comparison-table td {
    font-weight: normal;
}

.admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(2),
.admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(3),
.admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(4) {
    text-align: center;
}

.admission-comparison-table .premium {
    color: #003366;
}

/* Post Admission Process Comparison Table */
.post-admission-comparison-table {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 40px;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    text-align: left;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table th, .post-admission-comparison-table td {
    padding: 15px;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table th {
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table td {
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

/* Highlight "Personalised" and "Admission Guarantee" */
.post-admission-comparison-table td {
    font-weight: normal;
}

.post-admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(2),
.post-admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(3),
.post-admission-comparison-table td:nth-child(4) {
    text-align: center;
}
